game_description: The ultimate darts simulation, now with Meta Avatars and Multiplayer! 6 game modes including Cricket, along with 5 AAA quality rooms to play in. Experience the pinpoint accuracy of Quest while challenging your friends online in games of 501, 301, Cricket and 4 player Freethrow. Show off your fully customized darts by choosing from dozens of tips, barrels, shafts and flights. Create hundreds of combinations in our Dart Customization menu, including a Glow in the Dark set of each part! Single Player mode includes Cricket, 501, 301, and Around the world, all vs AI, as well as Freethrow and Speed Darts modes to get you warmed up. Gain achievements, and challenge players from around the world for top spot on one of our many Leaderboards. Play in one of five beautifully rendered AAA quality scenes including the Black Hat Tavern, the Tournament Arena, Basement Rec Room, and a Brutalist Default Room that also has a Glow in the Dark theme. See you in the Tavern!
Languages: English, Chinese (China), Dutch, French (France), German, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Spanish (Spain), Ukrainian
review_1: This is how VR darts is supposed to be played. The physics are spot on none of that guided automated crap. Me and buds always get a few rounds of cricket in and have a blast. Can't wait for the quest store release. Looking forward to the future updates. Solid developer.
review_2: A load of rubbish no hand tracking
review_3: Even if this game is still under development, it is the best dart game for the Quest 2. The other games have either non realistic gameplay or really really bad physics. I've never played a multiplayer match but for me the single player modes are really worth the money.
review_4: I bought both dart games today (for my oculus quest two) and this one is 100 times better than the other childish game forever VR darts. ￼ after playing both, ￼ I can't even begin to want to play the crappy one plus I just asked for a refund on forever VR darts. It just seems like those games are bloated with fancy graphics, but simplistic and chaotic and crappy gameplay. ￼ on target, VR darts really impresses me .
review_5: Tried to use this app and it wouldn’t launch.
